nodes.text: The Mangez system was a star system in the Expansion Region's Brak sector. The system contained at least two planet upon which Lant Mining Corporation conducted underground metal mining operations. Two orbital Lormar-class Refinery Stations were also present in the system, one of which was designated Lormar 23. Lant Mining Corporation planned on transporting a third Lormar-class station to the system to assist with refinery operations.
